ThingDef.label: ancient cryofreezer
ThingDef.description: A super-charged air-conditioning unit designed for its intended purpose of preventing genomes from breaking down entropically. Unfortunately, that temperature is also beyond the comfort range of almost all organic life but it can no longer maintain the desired output of approaching absolute zero.

ThingDef.label: ancient electrowomb
ThingDef.description: This device has collapsed in on itself, rendering it useless.

ThingDef.label: ancient electrowomb
ThingDef.description: This device has collapsed in on itself, rendering it useless.

ThingDef.label: ancient large electrowomb
ThingDef.description: The exterior shell has completely fallen apart, yet it seems that it exploded instead of imploded.

ThingDef.label: ancient genome recombinator
ThingDef.description: A very old recombinator that somehow possesses an awful stench and excessive mould.

ThingDef.label: ancient genomorpher
ThingDef.description: A Genomorpher that has fallen into complete disrepair, some salvage still remains.

ThingDef.label: ancient genome extractor table
ThingDef.description: Lacking proper maintenance for so long, this machine is rusted shut.

ThingDef.label: ancient genetics tinkering table
ThingDef.description: Most of the useful and otherwise functional parts are missing, indicating intentional sabotage.

ThingDef.label: ancient tissue grinder
ThingDef.description: The machinery and electronics are irreparable but could be broken down for scrap.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined bio-battery tank
ThingDef.description: This ancient tank once converted biological matter into an electrical current. It is now completely broken and useless.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined gene-tailoring pod
ThingDef.description: This ancient structure was once used to inject nanomachines in a subject in an attempt to create the perfect soldier. It now lies rusted and unsalvageable.

ThingDef.label: ancient microbiobattery
ThingDef.description: A very efficient battery that has somehow managed to survive for so long without maintenance, purpose-built to power genome storage rooms.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined genepod
ThingDef.description: An ancient genepod that was used to combine genetic material. This machine is obsolete and damaged beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: ancient animal control hub
ThingDef.description: It seems that this structure was capable of emitting some kind of electromagnetic radiation used to control brain function of certain animals. This was crude and primitive technology prone to failure and instability, and as such it is completely useless now.

ThingDef.label: ancient animal enrichment center
ThingDef.description: Whatever was held inside this dank, rusted metal coffin has long since escaped. It is damaged beyond all repair.

ThingDef.label: ancient construction platform
ThingDef.description: This deteriorated platform seems to have been used to assemble some kind of machinery. It now lays bare and empty.

ThingDef.label: ancient gene duplicator
ThingDef.description: This semi-spherical vat seems to have held some kind of viscuous liquid inside, as evidenced by the rancid-smelling residue coating its insides. It is now completely ruined and only useful as metal scrap.

ThingDef.label: ancient gene recombinator
ThingDef.description: A completely obsolete model of gene recombinator, that is also deteriorated and rusted beyond and salvaging.

ThingDef.label: ancient genetic database
ThingDef.description: This ancient computer was used to storage genetic information and feed genetic dataprints to other machines, but its components have deteriorated so far that all the data it contained has degraded to nothingness.

ThingDef.label: ancient genetic extraction table
ThingDef.description: Yet another workstation that has deteriorated beyond all recovery. A foul-smelling vial of stagnant liquid warns you to keep away from it.

ThingDef.label: ancient genetic storage
ThingDef.description: This little wheeled table housed a small specialized computer and refrigerated trays to store genetic material, but it is now so damaged it can only be used as scrap.

ThingDef.label: ancient genome sequencer
ThingDef.description: A large centrifuge used in gene sequencing. Its corroded parts will never be of use to anyone again.

ThingDef.label: ancient hexagel core reactor
ThingDef.description: A derelict bio-energy power plant.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined incubator
ThingDef.description: This small canister has been smashed to pieces and whatever it contained has long evaporated.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined lab barrel
ThingDef.description: Whatever this barrel held has long ago evaporated.

ThingDef.label: ancient server rack
ThingDef.description: This server rack once housed a lot of genetic information, but all its data has now degraded completely.

ThingDef.label: ancient comms table
ThingDef.description: This was once a smart table. But now it's dumb.

ThingDef.label: loose cables
ThingDef.description: This tangle of decayed cables were probably once housed inside the ceiling panels.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined crate
ThingDef.description: Whatever this crate contained has long ago rotted and turned to dust.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined crate
ThingDef.description: Whatever this crate contained has long ago rotted and turned to dust.

ThingDef.label: pile of ancient ruined crates
ThingDef.description: Whatever these crates contained has long ago rotted and turned to dust.

ThingDef.label: ancient mechanized crate
ThingDef.description: Whatever this crate contained has long ago rotted and turned to dust.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined lab barrels
ThingDef.description: Whatever this barrel held has long ago evaporated.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined vials
ThingDef.description: Small canisters that once held some valuable liquids.

ThingDef.label: ancient lab shelf
ThingDef.description: Rusted shelving units coated in grime and dust.

ThingDef.label: ancient mechanoid tinkering table
ThingDef.description: This workbench appears to have been used to try and reverse engineer mechanoid components, but it is damaged to the point of uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient mutanite centrifuge
ThingDef.description: A machine used to process mutagenic minerals, now completely broken and unsalvageable.

ThingDef.label: ancient nutrient vat
ThingDef.description: A slurry of liquefied organic pulp filled this reinforced glass vat. It now lays broken and empty.

ThingDef.label: ancient pulper
ThingDef.description: A weird-looking machine that shredded wood into organic pulp. Broken beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: ancient pulp recycler
ThingDef.description: An obsolete, ancient machine that recycled wood, corpses and bones into organic pulp. Broken beyond repair.

ThingDef.label: ancient refrigerated coils
ThingDef.description: These structural cryofuel coils have been completely ruined by time and neglect. They can no longer function.

ThingDef.label: ancient tissue growing vat
ThingDef.description: A metal sarcophagus used to grow bio-mechanic implants in a controlled manner. Its machinery has been gutted and has later decayed into rusted scrap.

ThingDef.label: ancient lab locker bank
ThingDef.description: An ancient, rusted bank of lockers. All of the lockers have been forced open with nothing valuable left behind.

ThingDef.label: ancient monitor banks
ThingDef.description: These monitors will never show any information again.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient sign
ThingDef.description: A weathered sign advertising a company that has long been forgotten.

ThingDef.label: ancient toilet
ThingDef.description: Drinking from this will give you more than just a few rads...

ThingDef.label: ancient sink
ThingDef.description: Drinking from this will give you more than just a few rads...

ThingDef.label: ancient bioluminescent light
ThingDef.description: A metallic capsule filled with some bioluminescent compound. This one seems to still be producing some faint light.

ThingDef.label: ancient bioluminescent light
ThingDef.description: A metallic capsule filled with some bioluminescent compound. This one seems to still be producing some faint light.

ThingDef.label: random booster
ThingDef.description: Spawn random booster.

ThingDef.label: random excavator
ThingDef.description: Spawn random excavator.

ThingDef.label: random genoframe
ThingDef.description: Spawn random genoframe.

ThingDef.label: random genome
ThingDef.description: Spawn random genome.

ThingDef.label: ancient mechahybridizer
ThingDef.description: The broken maws of this ancient factory will never be able to close again.

ThingDef.label: ancient mechahybrid antenna
ThingDef.description: A collapsed antenna that is completely unable of transmitting anything ever again.
